1.verse: God be merciful unto us, and bless us; and cause his face to shine upon us; Selah.

2.verse: That thy way may be known upon earth, thy saving health among all nations.

3.verse: Let the people praise thee, O God; let all the people praise thee.

4.verse: O let the nations be glad and sing for joy: for thou shalt judge the people righteously, and govern the nations upon earth. Selah.

5.verse: Let the people praise thee, O God; let all the people praise thee.

6.verse: Then shall the earth yield her increase; and God, even our own God, shall bless us.

7.verse: God shall bless us; and all the ends of the earth shall fear him.
